favourite.article: I learned this song as a youth -- I'm now 69 and sang it whenever needed and was telling my VBS class and they loved it -- two girls were in a scarey situation the day after and shared how they sang the first verse. Our God is so good!

What a mighty and loving God we serve. We experience Him as our Jubilee. He had worked out every last provision for His people. May we be immersed with Him as Jesus was with the Father. In Him, we shall never be afraid.
